personalInfo.name: Maliha
personalInfo.title: Custom Poster Editor & Framer
personalInfo.bio: I transform your favorite posters into stunning framed art pieces. From custom editing to premium framing, I deliver ready-to-hang masterpieces that elevate your space.

services.title: Digital Edit Only
services.description: Color correction, upscaling, and custom text additions to your existing digital poster.

services.title: Print & Frame
services.description: High-quality printing of your poster and standard framing in black, white, or natural wood.

services.title: The Masterpiece
services.description: Premium museum-quality glass, custom matting, and solid wood frames for a truly elevated look.

process.title: Custom Editing
process.description: We enhance, resize, or stylize your poster to your exact preferences.

process.title: Premium Framing
process.description: Choose from our selection of high-quality frames and matting.

process.title: Delivery
process.description: Receive your ready-to-hang masterpiece securely packaged.

works.title: Custom Framed Poster
works.description: A visually striking custom edited poster, beautifully framed for a modern living space.
